# The `ModulePass` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modulepass">ModulePass</a> class - This class is used to implement unstructured interprocedural optimizations and analyses. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modulepass">ModulePass</a> class - This class is used to implement unstructured interprocedural optimizations and analyses.

ModulePasses may do anything they want to the program.

Definition at line 251 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/pass-h">Pass.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### ModulePass() {#a723659a08d210f4f566887bda3f9f976}

<MemberDefinition
